name: Side Swipe - Minimalist Arcade Action
description:
SIDE SWIPE is a reflex driven minimalist arcade game with simple swipe controls

Swipe the screen correctly at an ever increasing pace to destroy the falling shapes. Be quick about it, if they get to the bottom of the screen you lose. Swipe the wrong direction and you will also lose.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
● Simple One Touch Controls
● Free To Play
● Endlessly replay-able
● Simple to learn, impossible to master
● High Score Leader Board
